remarks: The inverse function of a group.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Oct-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
grpinvfval.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
grpinvfval.2 $e |- U = ( GId ` G ) $.
grpinvfval.3 $e |- N = ( inv ` G ) $.
grpoinvfval $p |- ( G e. GrpOp -> N = ( x e. X |-> ( iota_ y e. X ( y G x ) = U ) ) ) $.
$d G x y $.
$d U x $.
$d X x y $.
$d x y $.
